bibl.title: Leslie S.B. MacCOULL, Sarah CLACKSON, and Contributions by Simon HOPKINS and Ranon KATZOFF, The Elephantine Papyri in English. Three Millennia of Cross-cultural Continuity and Change.
bibl.note: 175 documents, including letters and legal contracts from family and other archives. Each section contains translated and extensively annotated documents of one language group. The Aramaic, Demotic and Greek sections are concluded with a prosopography.
bibl.seg: PORTEN Bezalel, with J. Joel FARBER, Cary J. MARTIN, Günter VITTMANN, Leslie S.B. MacCOULL, Sarah CLACKSON, and Contributions by Simon HOPKINS and Ranon KATZOFF, The Elephantine Papyri in English. Three Millennia of Cross-cultural Continuity and Change. (Documenta et Monumenta Orientis Antiqui. 22.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 1996, 4°, xviii-621 pp., 11 ill. ISBN 90-04-10197-7. Hfl. 511,26.

175 documents, including letters and legal contracts from family and other archives. Each section contains translated and extensively annotated documents of one language group. The Aramaic, Demotic and Greek sections are concluded with a prosopography.
C.R. par Ewa Wipszycka, JJurP 27 (1997) pp. 165-169. - Hélène Lozachmeur et Michel Pezin, Syria 76 (1999) pp. 310-312.
Porten Farber Martin Vittmann MacCoull Clackson Hopkins Katzoff
